item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Shame on you Simon. Listen with attention!!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Shame on you Simon. Listen with attention!!!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>I made my first playlist on the iPod last night! An eclectic mix of songs ranging from 'Teen Age Riot' (Sonic Youth) to the beautiful 'Flicker' (Kathryn Williams), it will keep me very happy whilst pretending to listen to the Business Services business plan for 2004 to 2005 at my departmental away-day on Friday!!! Thanks once again for such a fab gift.</p>
item.content:encoded: I made my first playlist on the iPod last night! An eclectic mix of songs ranging from ‘Teen Age Riot’ (Sonic Youth) to the beautiful ‘Flicker’ (Kathryn Williams), it will keep me very happy whilst pretending to listen to the Business Services business plan for 2004 to 2005 at my departmental away-day on Friday!!! Thanks once again for such a fab gift.
